body:
Same
Everything is gonna be a home run at this rate

I can see the sequel... boy will hit the koshien winning home run, girl and boy gets engaged, boy buys a ring for girl, boy gets drafted for the nipponham fighters, they get married with a baby on the way, boy gets a million dollar rookie contract, hyped up to be the next ichiro suzuki, rips right shoulder rotator cuff (he is right handed because he is fingering her w right hand), club physician gives up cuz bone pieces in shoulder, alcohol, retires, alcohol, domestic abuse, drugs, alcohol, cobain to the back of mouth
98 ma man hti a home run
